name: drift-v2
description: On-chain perpetuals dex with multiple liquidity mechanisms.

name: mango-v4
description: Mango Markets provides a single venue to lend, borrow, swap, and leverage-trade crypto assets through a powerful risk engine.

name: marginfi
description: Marginfi is a decentralized liquidity aggregation protocol that allows users to access a range of lending markets through a single platform.

name: marinade-finance
description: Marinde Anchor-Based, first on mainnet, liquid-staking-program and mSOL->SOL swap pool.

name: mpl-bubblegum
description: Program for creating and interacting with compressed Metaplex NFTs. Compressed NFTs are secured on-chain using Merkle trees.

name: mpl-token-metadata
description: Attach additional data to Fungible or Non-Fungible Tokens on Solana.

name: openbook-v2
description: On-chain orderbook.

name: perpetuals
description: Solana Perpetuals protocol is an open-source implementation of a non-custodial decentralized exchange that supports leveraged trading in a variety of assets.

name: phoenix-v1
description: Phoenix is an on-chain orderbook that operates without a crank.

name: solend
description: Solend is an algorithmic, decentralized protocol for lending and borrowing.

name: soundwork-contracts
description: A decentralized Sound Network that seeks to revolutionize music production and redefine the music industryâ€™s supply chain.

name: spl-account-compression
description: Make edits to off-chain data with on-chain verification.

name: spl-associated-token-account
description: Associated token account program.

name: spl-feature-gate
description: This program serves to manage new features on Solana.

name: spl-governance
description: SPL Governance is a program the chief purpose of which is to provide core building blocks and primitives to create Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs).

name: spl-instruction-padding
description: A program for padding instructions with additional data or accounts, to be used for testing larger transactions, either more instruction data, or more accounts.

name: spl-managed-token
description: On-chain program for managed tokens, SPL tokens that are perpetually frozen, and must be used through this program, which will thaw the account, perform an instruction, and re-freeze the account.

name: spl-memo
description: A simple program that validates a string of UTF-8 encoded characters and logs it in the transaction log.

name: spl-name-service
description: A spl program for issuing and managing ownership of: domain names, Solana Pubkeys, URLs, twitter handles, ipfs cid's, metadata, etc...

name: spl-noop
description: Does nothing.

name: spl-single-pool
description: The single-validator stake pool program is an upcoming SPL program that enables liquid staking with zero fees, no counterparty, and 100% capital efficiency.

name: spl-stake-pool
description: A program for pooling together SOL to be staked by an off-chain agent running a Delegation Bot which redistributes the stakes across the network and tries to maximize censorship resistance and rewards.

name: spl-token
description: A token program on the Solana blockchain, usable for fungible and non-fungible tokens.

name: spl-token-2022
description: A token program on the Solana blockchain, usable for fungible and non-fungible tokens.

name: spl-token-collection
description: This program serves as a reference implementation for using the SPL Token Group interface to create an on-chain program for managing token collections - such as NFT Collections.

name: spl-token-lending
description: A lending protocol for the Token program on the Solana blockchain inspired by Aave and Compound.

name: spl-token-swap
description: A Uniswap-like exchange for the Token program on the Solana blockchain.

name: spl-token-upgrade
description: The Token Upgrade Program provides a stateless protocol for permanently converting tokens from one mint to another.

name: squads-mpl
description: The program facilitates signing and executing transactions on behalf of a multisig.

name: stable-swap
description: An automated market maker for mean-reverting trading pairs.

name: uxd
description: Implementation of a program that manages on chain accounts to mint and redeem Redeemables tokens (UXD), hedged by a delta neutral position on underlying DEXes.

name: whirlpool
description: Whirpools is an open-source concentrated liquidity AMM contract on the Solana blockchain.

name: xnft
description: A protocol for minting and managing executable NFTs.
